song_lyrics: Basat Vartāl takhat, Ghanshyām, Dharmakuvar pūrankām,
Dhavalnagar me madan Mohan, Gaḍhpur Gopīnāth,
Sundar mūḷī me Shrī Kṛuṣhṇa kripāl... ° 3
Premānand kahe jo ehī dhām parase tāke nāsh hot sakal,
title: Basat Vartāl takhat Ghanshyām

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-833: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
